info.title: Debit Memo Request (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:

You can read entire debit memo requests or only parts of the data, using the provided filters.

You can create debit memo requests. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (a header plus the following entities: header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.

For existing debit memo requests, you can create new items. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (with the following entities: item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.

For existing debit memo requests, you can update the following entities (that is, you can change the content of their properties): header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

For existing debit memo requests, you can delete the header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

You can accept or deny approval requests for debit memo requests that cannot be processed without the consent of an approver.

Note: Certain elements and entities can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete debit memo requests with this synchronous OData API

get.summary: Reads the item partners for all debit memo requests.
get.description: Reads the partner data from the items of all debit memo requests in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Item number of the SD document

get.summary: Reads the item partners of a specific item and with a specific partner function in a specific debit memo request.
get.description: Reads the item partners with a specific partner function of a specific debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, item number, and partner function.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the item partners of a specific item and with a specific partner function in a specific debit memo request.
patch.description: Updates the item partners with a specific partner function of a specific debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, item number, and partner function.

delete.summary: Deletes the item partners of a specific item and with a specific partner function in a specific debit memo request.
delete.description: Deletes the item partners with a specific partner function of a specific debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, item number, and partner function.

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Item number of the SD document

get.description: Reads the debit memo request header data for a specific item partner function. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, item number, and partner function.

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Item number of the SD document

post.description: Creates value-added service data for a specific debit memo request item that you must specify in the payload. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Item number of the reference item

get.summary: Reads a specific line of a value-added service.
get.description: Reads a specific value-added service data using debit memo request ID, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates a specific value-added service of a debit memo request item.
patch.description: Updates the data of a specific value-added service item using debit memo request ID, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

delete.summary: Deletes a specific value-added service of a debit memo request item.
delete.description: Deletes the data of a specific value-added service item using debit memo request ID, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_DebitMemoReqItemPartner HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
